Uses of Class
playn.core.Texture

    • Uses of Texture in playn.core

      Fields in playn.core declared as Texture 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Texture TextureSurface.texture
      The texture into which we're rendering.
      Methods in playn.core that return Texture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Texture Graphics.createTexture(float width, float height, Texture.Config config)
      Creates an empty texture into which one can render.
      Texture Graphics.createTexture(pythagoras.f.IDimension size, Texture.Config config)
      See Graphics.createTexture(float,float,Texture.Config).
      Texture Image.createTexture(Texture.Config config)
      Creates a texture with this image's bitmap data using config.
      abstract Texture Tile.texture()
      The texture which contains this tile.
      Texture Texture.texture() 
      Texture Image.texture()
      Returns, creating if necessary, this image's default texture.
      Texture Canvas.toTexture()
      Calls Canvas.toTexture(Texture.Config) with the default texture config.
      Texture Canvas.toTexture(Texture.Config config)
      A helper function for creating a texture from this canvas's image, and then disposing this canvas.
      Methods in playn.core that return types with arguments of type Texture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      react.RFuture<Texture> Image.textureAsync()
      Returns a future which will deliver the default texture for this image once its loading has completed.
      Methods in playn.core with parameters of type Texture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds tex as a transformed axis-aligned quad to this batch.

      Adds tex as a transformed axis-aligned quad to this batch.
      void TriangleBatch.addTris(Texture tex, int tint, pythagoras.f.AffineTransform xf, float[] xys, float[] sxys, int xysOffset, int xysLen, int[] indices, int indicesOffset, int indicesLen, int indexBase)
      Adds a collection of textured triangles to the current render operation.

      Adds a collection of textured triangles to the current render operation.
      static RenderTarget RenderTarget.create(Graphics gfx, Texture tex)
      Creates a render target that renders to texture.
      Surface Surface.setFillPattern(Texture texture)
      Sets the texture to be used for fill operations.
      void TexturedBatch.setTexture(Texture texture)
      Prepares this batch to render using the supplied texture.
